alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 11:38AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Nye and southwestern Eureka Counties through 1215 PM PDT... At 1138 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 30 miles southeast of Hickison Summit, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Thess storms will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Nye and southwestern Eureka Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
